Html:
Hello,

First of all, my apologize for my poor English.

I'm looking for a function but i don't know its translation. But in Excel, it's a check box function in the Cell Format window, just above ShrinkToFit and Merge functions but below the Alignemnt functions.

It consists in resizing the row height according to cell content.

I hope it could describe it correctly.

Thanks for your answers.

S.
Check out the PHPExcel_Worksheet_RowDimension object, there should be a setRowHeight method in there.

Thanks for your answer, but i don't want to 'set' row height but it set by itself automatically.

S.

What you want is probably wrap text:

http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=32328#Post107303
